name: Cliffwatch Strand
role_in_state: maritime sentinel and coastal repair hub
culture_adjustments: ritual cliff-watch wakes and night-vigils distinct from port launches
compressed Coastal Tongues register with cliff-top nautical terms
stronger ancestor-veneration focused on sea-fallen kin at cliff shrines
watch-clans enforce kin-based harbor governance and access
practical hull-repair craft traditions prioritized over large-vessel ceremony
constraints: no deep-water docks â€” large oceangoing ships cannot berth
augury rituals consume rare imported reagents
careening and launches confined to calm-season windows
notes: sentinel posts levy passage and pilotage fees on coastal traders
salt-terraces and lookouts are often co-located for economy and cover
shipwright registers adapted to rugged shore materials and quick repairs
